title: simpleGuestStay
description: A simpleGuestStay object is a simplified version of the guestStay object. It contains information about the location, duration and other details of the stay, as well as information about the primary guest. It is intended to be used by applications that do not require the full set of fields in the guestStay object.

accountName.description: Property code that the stay belongs to

checkInDate.description: Scheduled check-in date of the stay

checkedInBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that checked the guest in

checkOutDate.description: Scheduled check-out date of the stay

checkedOutBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that checked the guest out

roomNumber.description: Room number or room identifier of the stay

roomType.description: Room type of the stay, preferably in code/short form

channel.description: Channel by which the stay was booked

ratePlanCode.description: Rate plan name or rate code of the stay

email.description: Primary email address of the guest

phone.description: Primary phone number of the guest

addressLine1.description: Primary address of the guest: line 1

addressLine2.description: Primary address of the guest: line 2

city.description: Primary address of the guest: city

state.description: Primary address of the guest: state or province, preferably short code

country.description: Primary address of the guest: country, preferably ISO3166 2-character code

postalCode.description: Primary address of the guest: zip or postal code

loyaltyNumber.description: Loyalty program number of the guest

groupName.description: Name on primary group profile associated with the stay
